verses.name: Romans 8:36
verses.text: As it is written, For thy sake we are killed all the day long; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter.

verses.name: Romans 8:37
verses.text: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

verses.name: Romans 8:38
verses.text: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come,

verses.name: Romans 8:39
verses.text: Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
